overview: A muddled tranquility arises in a strict Brahmin family when the elder son Pramesor brings in a girl Thoibi, a Chingmi ningol from Kabui tribe of Keishamthong, Imphal. An adaptation of the Shumang Leela blockbuster of the same name,Oinam Gautam's film is a social commentary which tackles the rigid conventional barrier of religion and community.
title: Keishamthong Thoibi
